title: Al-Hilla SC
text:
Al-Hilla Sport Club (), is an <a href="Iraq">Iraq</a>i football team based in <a href="Al-Hilla%20District">Al-Hilla</a>, <a href="Babil%20Governorate">Babil</a>, that plays in <a href="Iraq%20Division%20Two">Iraq Division Two</a>.
History.
Al-Hilla Sports Club was established in 1964, the team played for the first time in the <a href="Iraqi%20Premier%20League">Iraqi Premier League</a> at the <a href="1975%E2%80%9376%20Iraqi%20National%20League">1975–76 season</a>, the team ended their first season in tenth place and was able to continue playing in the league, and their results were not good, as it won five matches, drawing seven, and lost 12. The team played their second season, the <a href="1976%E2%80%9377%20Iraqi%20National%20League">1976–77 season</a>, in the league very badly and their results were disastrous, as it could not win any match, drawing three and lost all other matches, and finished in last place at the end of the season, but they were fortunate because that the <a href="Iraq%20Football%20Association">Football Association</a> decided not to relegate any club, which allowed the team to play a third season in the league. The third season, the <a href="1977%E2%80%9378%20Iraqi%20National%20League">1977–78 season</a>, did not bring anything new, as the team continued its poor results, winning one match, drawing two and losing all their other matches, and relegated to the <a href="Iraq%20Division%20One">Iraq Division One</a>.
